parameter.value:
<script>
var productsArr = [];
    for (i = 0; i < _NB_LO.length; i++) { //2개 동시 주문 없으면 loop 제거
      productsArr.push({
        'name': document.querySelector('input[name="ai_pnm[]"]').value,
        'id': document.querySelector('input[name="ai_pid[]"]').value,
        'price': document.querySelector('input[name="ai_ppc[]"]').value,
		'brand': document.querySelector('input[name="ai_ppb[]"]').value,			
		'category': document.querySelector('input[name="ai_pca[]"]').value,		
		'variant': document.querySelector('input[name="productName"]').value,
		'quantity': document.querySelector('input[name="ai_pqt[]"]').value
	  })
    }
window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
window.dataLayer.push({
	'event': 'eec.purchase',				
	'ecommerce': {							
		'purchase': {						
			'actionField': {
          'id': document.querySelector('input[name="ao_oid"]').value, 
          'affiliation': document.querySelector('input[name="ao_aff"]').value,
          'revenue': document.querySelector('input[name="ao_rev"]').value, 
          'tax': document.querySelector('input[name="ao_tx"]').value,
          'shipping': '0.00',
          'coupon': document.querySelector('input[name="ao_cpn"]').value
        },
        'products': productsArr
      }
    }
  });
  
  </script>

<script>
var productsArr = [];
    for (i = 0; i < _NB_LO.length; i++) {
      productsArr.push({
        'name': _NB_LO[i].PN,
        'id': _NB_LO[i].PC,
        'price': _NB_LO[i].PR,
		'brand': '',			
		'category': '',		
		'variant': '',
		'quantity': _NB_LO[i].AM
		
	  })
    }
window.dataLayer  = window.dataLayer || [];
window.dataLayer.push({
        'event': 'eec.checkout',
        'ecommerce': {
          'checkout': {
            'actionField': {'step': 1, 'option': ''},
            'products': productsArr
      }
    }
  });
  
</script>

<script>
window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
window.dataLayer.push({
	'event': 'eec.checkout',				// name of an event. In this case, always stays as eec.checkout
	'ecommerce': {							// ecommerce object. This is the essential part of tracking. New EE data must always be pushed to this object
		'checkout': {						// name of an action. In this case, always stays as checkout
			'actionField': {	
				'step': 2					// number of the current checkout step that a user has entered (must always be 2 in this situation) 
			}
    }
  }
});
</script>

<script>
var ana_quantity = document.querySelector("#totalPrice > span").innerText.split('(')[1].replace(/\D/g, '')
window.dataLayer  = window.dataLayer || [];
window.dataLayer.push({
	'event': 'eec.addToCart',  		
	'ecommerce': {					
		'currencyCode': 'KOR',			
		'add': {						
			'actionField': {			
				'list': window.location.pathname
			  },		
			'products': [{     			
				'name': _NB_PD,      
				'id': _NB_PC,     	
				'price': _NB_AMT,		
				'brand': '',		
				'category': '',	
				'variant': '',     
				'quantity': parseInt(ana_quantity)
			}]
		}
	}
});

</script>

<script>
var productsArr = [];
    for (i = 0; i < _NB_LO.length; i++) {
      productsArr.push({
        'name': _NB_LO[i].PN,
        'id': _NB_LO[i].PC,
        'price': _NB_LO[i].PR,
		'brand': '',			
		'category': _NB_EC_OBJ.order_product[i].category_name_1,		
		'variant': _NB_LO[i].PN.substring(_NB_LO[i].PN.lastIndexOf('['),_NB_LO[i].PN.length),
		'quantity': _NB_LO[i].AM
		
	  })
    }
window.dataLayer  = window.dataLayer || [];
window.dataLayer.push({
	'event': 'eec.purchase',				
	'ecommerce': {							
		'purchase': {						
			'actionField': {
          'id': _NB_ORD_NO, 
          'affiliation': '',
          'revenue': _NB_EC_OBJ.payed_amount, 
          'tax': '0.00',
          'shipping': '0.00',
          'coupon': ''
        },
        'products': productsArr
      }
    }
  });
  
  </script>
